allSeasonalCampaigns.title: AgriBoost Season Kickoff
allSeasonalCampaigns.description: A seasonal campaign offering discounted drone planting services for farmers at the start of the planting season.

allSeasonalCampaigns.title: Fly With Us Operator Drive
allSeasonalCampaigns.description: A recruitment campaign targeting drone pilots, encouraging licenses and guaranteed crop projects based on location availability.

allSeasonalCampaigns.title: Harvest Ready Agri Drone Drive
allSeasonalCampaigns.description: A campaign to prepare farmers for the harvest season, offering last discounts on crop monitoring and aerial spraying services.

allSeasonalCampaigns.title: Spring Planting Special
allSeasonalCampaigns.description: Get ready for spring with our exclusive planting packages designed for maximum yield and efficiency.

allSeasonalCampaigns.title: Winter Prep Campaign
allSeasonalCampaigns.description: Prepare your fields for winter with our specialized drone services and soil analysis packages.

allSeasonalCampaigns.title: Summer Growth Monitoring
allSeasonalCampaigns.description: Track your crop growth throughout summer with our advanced monitoring and analytics services.

allSeasonalCampaigns.title: Autumn Harvest Support
allSeasonalCampaigns.description: Maximize your autumn harvest with our comprehensive drone support and logistics coordination.

allSeasonalCampaigns.title: Pest Control Initiative
allSeasonalCampaigns.description: Protect your crops with our targeted pest control campaigns using precision drone technology.

allSeasonalCampaigns.title: Irrigation Optimization
allSeasonalCampaigns.description: Optimize water usage with our smart irrigation monitoring and management solutions.

allLoyaltyPrograms.title: Earn Rewards on Every Service
allLoyaltyPrograms.description: Each time you book or use our services, you collect reward points. Over time, these points can be redeemed for discounts, credits, or rewards.

allLoyaltyPrograms.title: Unlock Exclusive Member Benefits
allLoyaltyPrograms.description: As part of our loyalty program, you'll gain access to exclusive perks such as weekend promotions, early access to new services, and premium rewards.

allLoyaltyPrograms.title: Share & Save Through Referrals
allLoyaltyPrograms.description: Invite your farming colleagues to join and enjoy our services. Every referred referral earns you special perks and special discounts.

allLoyaltyPrograms.title: VIP Platinum Membership
allLoyaltyPrograms.description: Reach platinum status and enjoy priority booking, dedicated support, and exclusive seasonal discounts.

allLoyaltyPrograms.title: Birthday Bonus Program
allLoyaltyPrograms.description: Celebrate your special day with bonus points and exclusive offers available during your birthday month.

allLoyaltyPrograms.title: Early Bird Rewards
allLoyaltyPrograms.description: Book services in advance and earn extra points plus guaranteed availability during peak seasons.
